item.title: Builder
item.description: I started with a Nmap scan to know things that are running on this machine from the above nmap scan we can see port 22 and 8080 is open in port 8080 jetty is running (jetty is a java web server or a servelet container) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jetty_(web_server) Here’s the jenikins dashboard and jenikins version is 2.441 in the people tab we have a user called jennifer enkins is a Java application. The server is Jetty, a Java web server.
